name: Create new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet from new VK.com posts
description:
This template periodically checks for new wall posts on VK.com and adds the retrieved information to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. 

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1o6bfEE8UMPkO3qVkiHTPS716C80Hz1vc4GDZCDgofO0/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as a destination for the VK.com post data. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
